description: After a barrage of criticism from Facebook today, Apple is yet again doubling down on its forthcoming App Tracking Transparency feature. The feature will launch to users in 2021, and Apple says it “does not require Facebook to change its approach to tracking …

title: Future Snapdragon phones can get up to four years of security updates - Engadget
description: A new partnership between Google and Qualcomm will see the two companies work together to improve Project Treble and further simplify the update process for devices that feature a Qualcomm chipset.

Since 2015, Google has offered a timeline feature through Maps that allows you to retrace where you were on a specific day in the past. With the latest version of app, you’ll find a new way to see all the photos you took on a given day.
title: Google Photos lets you relive a day through your Maps timeline - Engadget

description: Google says it will continue to offer the free-as-in-beer Home edition.

description: CD Projekt Red is on a rampage that is tearing through its reputation as well as the reputation of its partners and the media.

title: Devices Used In COVID-19 Treatment Can Give Errors For Patients With Dark Skin - NPR
description: Fingertip devices that measure oxygen in the blood can sometimes give erroneous readings in people with dark skin, doctors report. The devices can say oxygen levels are normal when they're not.

NASA Awards Launch Services Contract to Blue Origin for New Glenn Launch Services - NASA
description: NASA has awarded a NASA Launch Services (NLS) II contract to Blue Origin and their New Glenn launch service in accordance with the contract’s on-ramp provision.
